question:
[Bruce] and his son [Brian] went to look at cars. [Bruce] ended up buying the Mustang. [Morgan] had a daughter named [Frances]. [Morgan] went car shopping with her husband [Dale] and her daughter [Frances]. [Brian] and his brother [Kenneth] always played pranks on each other [Bruce] wanted to buy his sister a birthday gift but her son [Dale] said she did n't want any gifts. [Joy] took her sister, [Morgan], out to dinner for her birthday. [Harry] took his son [Cyrus] to the store to buy some bread. His wife [Joy] stayed home with [Cyrus]'s brother [Victor] to watch a movie.
Question: How is [Victor] related to [Kenneth]?
